actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ambush hag makes two Claw attacks or three Poison Spray attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 13 (2d8+4) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 CON save or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Poison Spray
actions.desc: _Ranged Spell Attack:_ +8 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 22 (4d8+4) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 STR save or be restrained until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc:
The ambush hag casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using CHA as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):
At will: _message_, _minor illusion_, _prestidigitation_
3/day each: _blur_, _charm_, _hallucinatory terrain_ (as an action)
1/day each: _hypnotic pattern_, _major image_, _seeming_

special_abilities.name: Fey Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The ambush hag is resistant to the charmed and unconscious conditions.

special_abilities.name: Mimicry
special_abilities.desc: The hag can mimic Animal sounds and Humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 16 WIS (Insight) check.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The ambush hag can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
